About the Company: HT Media Ltd. is engaged in print media, electronic media and also conducts several marketing events. The company owns one of the leading newspaper Hindustan Times printed in Hindi and English languages.In an exclusive agreement with Wall Street Journal, the company also publishes Mint which has a presence in the key markets of Delhi, Mumbai and Bangalore.The other publications of the company includes Metro Now & HT Next a newspaper focused on youth readers.The company has also forayed into the internet space businesses & created various portals namely Shine.com, Livemint.com, Desimartini.com and Hindustantimes.com, has launched the FM radio channel - Fever 104, forayed into Events and marketing solutions & hosts various events such as HT City Delhi Shopping Fest, Fever 104 A. R. Rahman Concert, Miss India Worldwide, HT Polo, HT I Love Delhi and Mint HT Luxury Conference..The company also in the business segment of Digital, Radio Broadcast, Printing and Publishing.
